item.description:
We will engage in a variety of solo and partner practices to increase your vitality and aliveness, ground and connect to Source, open your energy channels, and explore your dynamic connection with others.

♦ Expand your capacity for Pleasure!
♦ Enhance your connection with Self!
♦ Ground, clear, protect and expand your energy field!
♦ Explore connection with other like-minded souls!
♦ Infuse Passion and Vitality into all aspects of your life!
♦ Have fun!

You will learn practices to cultivate your creative, orgasmic, spiritual and relational potential within the context of a warm, welcoming community. Beginners welcome. No partner necessary. This MeetUp has elements of both the Tantric Energy Fundaments series and the upcoming Tantric Intimacy series â€“ Tuesdays in July.

Wear loose comfortable clothing. Bring a water bottle and back jack if you have one.
item.how_to_find_us: upstairs through the door to the left of the Burren
item.name: Tantric Fun(damentals) Sampler
